name: Premium AI News Newsletter (Native Nodes) v2

message.content: Find the 10 most significant AI and AI application news stories, breakthroughs, or announcements from the past 24 hours. For each story, provide: title (string), source (string), url (string), and summary (2 sentences max). Return ONLY a valid JSON array with these exact fields: [{"title": "...", "source": "...", "url": "...", "summary": "..."}]. No other text or formatting.

Find 5 major AI product launches, funding announcements, or company news from the past 24 hours. For each story, provide: title (string), source (string), url (string), and summary (2 sentences max). Return ONLY a valid JSON array with these exact fields: [{"title": "...", "source": "...", "url": "...", "summary": "..."}]. No other text or formatting.

Find 5 significant AI research breakthroughs or academic announcements from the past 24 hours. For each story, provide: title (string), source (string), url (string), and summary (2 sentences max). Return ONLY a valid JSON array with these exact fields: [{"title": "...", "source": "...", "url": "...", "summary": "..."}]. No other text or formatting.

Find 5 real-world AI application stories or case studies from the past 24 hours. For each story, provide: title (string), source (string), url (string), and summary (2 sentences max). Return ONLY a valid JSON array with these exact fields: [{"title": "...", "source": "...", "url": "...", "summary": "..."}]. No other text or formatting.

parameters.text:
=You are an expert AI news curator creating a premium daily newsletter for AI professionals.

I have {{ $json.count }} articles from multiple premium sources:
- üî¨ Research: arXiv papers (cutting-edge research)
- üì¢ Announcements: Official blogs from OpenAI, Anthropic, DeepMind, Meta
- üì∞ News: Curated breaking news from Perplexity

Your task:
1. Select the 8-10 MOST SIGNIFICANT and IMPACTFUL stories
2. **ENSURE DIVERSITY**: Select 2-3 news items, 2-3 announcements, and 3-4 research papers for a balanced newsletter
3. Prioritize: Breaking news > Major announcements > Breakthrough research
4. For each story:
   - Write a compelling headline (can rephrase)
   - Write 2-3 sentences explaining WHY this matters to AI professionals
   - Assess impact: "High" or "Medium"
   - Keep the original link and source
   - Preserve the sourceType (research/announcement/news)

5. Write an "Editor's Note" (2-3 sentences) highlighting the main theme

Articles:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.articles, null, 2) }}

Return ONLY valid JSON in this exact format:
{
  "editorsNote": "Overview of key trends",
  "stories": [
    {
      "headline": "Compelling headline",
      "summary": "Why this matters (2-3 sentences)",
      "impact": "High",
      "link": "original URL",
      "source": "source name",
      "type": "research"
    }
  ]
}
